summary: Documentary exploring the deep-seated biases and attitudes about skin color---particularly dark skinned women, outside of and within the Black American culture.
cast: Soren Baker|Ronald Boutelle|Joni Bovill|Kirk Bovill|Michael Colyar|Benton Cooke|Viola Davis|Timothy Foley|Corinne Gilliard|Marcia Glenn|Cheryl Grills|Lynne Herod-Deverges|Stephanie IsComedy|Bill Johnson|Douglas Kearney|Pemon Rami|Daryl Rowe|Matthew Shenoda|Tammie Smalls|Tifase Webb-Msemaji|Emily Yang
director: Directors: D. Channsin Berry, Bill Duke
title: Dark Girls
